import React from 'react' function Rating(props) { const {rating, numReviews} = props const rat = 4 return <> =1?"fa fa-star":"fa fa-star-half"} aria-hidden="true"> =2?"fa fa-star":"fa fa-star-half"} aria-hidden="true"> =3?"fa fa-star":"fa fa-star-half"} aria-hidden="true"> =4?"fa fa-star":"fa fa-star-half"} aria-hidden="true"> =5?"fa fa-star":"fa fa-star-half"} aria-hidden="true"> {rating} {numReviews} rating
} export default Rating
